state_analysis: The attempt to restart the Docker container has timed out again, indicating that the container may be unresponsive or the Docker service itself may be experiencing issues. This situation has persisted through multiple commands and attempts to regain control of the environment.
explanation: Given the ongoing issues with the terminal and Docker container, the best course of action is to forcibly stop the container and create a new one. This will reset the environment and allow us to start fresh. I will provide commands to do that.
